dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: An 8x8 grid world where an agent must navigate to a goal while avoiding holes. The environment is stochastic, with slippery tiles that can cause the agent to move in unintended directions.
dcterms:title: FrozenLake

dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: A larger, stochastic version of a linear chain environment where an agent can move left or right, with a small probability of slipping to the opposite direction. The goal is to reach the right end of the chain.
dcterms:title: NChain

dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: A classic control problem where the objective is to balance a pendulum upright by applying torque to its base. The task is continuous and requires precise control.
dcterms:title: Pendulum-v0

dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: A control task where the goal is to swing up a two-link robotic arm to a vertical position. The task is continuous and requires managing the dynamics of the arm.
dcterms:title: Acrobot-v1
